data.text:
We are already celebrating the New Year! 🎉
In 2018 we will open 58 new routes and have three new bases: Marseille, Bilbao and Athens! This will enable us to offer 250 more jobs than 2017. 😉
Our family is extending! 👨‍👩‍👧 #Volotea https://t.co/tOiVK6GD9h

domain.name: Place
domain.description: Named places in the world, like Fenway Park

data.text:
Do you want to grow professionally close to home? 
In VOLOTEA we offer Senior Cabin Crew positions in our French bases: Nantes, Toulouse, Strasbourg, Marseille, and Bordeaux. 
If you want to join us, apply through this link 👉https://t.co/mAkuRqXHdO https://t.co/i99aWIIYvl

From next year we’ll have 4 new Airbus A319 with very original names created by you Voloteans: “Hasta la pista baby”, “Jetflix”, “C’est parti” and “The plane to be”.
The A319 will allow us to transport up to 20% more passengers and to serve longer routes! 😃❤ #Volotea https://t.co/Mo98azTvG0
Few hours left to book a trip of a lifetime starting 1€ ! 😁 Hurry up and choose among our multiple flights to beautiful destinations 👉 https://t.co/mdaZoA6YY8 https://t.co/HdmPTeTES8
